articles.title: Einstein Was Right – Euclid Just Captured Space-Time Warping in a Perfect Cosmic Ring - SciTechDaily
articles.description: Euclid, a space telescope on a mission to uncover the secrets of dark matter and dark energy, has already made a stunning discovery: a perfectly formed Einstein ring hidden in a well-known galaxy. This rare phenomenon, predicted by Einstein’s theory of relati…
articles.content: A close-up view of the center of the NGC 6505 galaxy, with the bright Einstein ring around its nucleus, captured by ESA’s Euclid space telescope. The Einstein ring is formed by gravitational lensing,… [+10272 chars]
